title: Apollo Direct (2 pc) 165 Degree Hinges Soft Close, Clip-on, Cam Adjust, Zero Protrusion for Lazy Susan Corner cabinets, Pull Out Drawer cabinets, Closets, Garage cabinets, mounting Plates (Included)
description: ✅ 165’ Degree multi-pivot Concealed Hinge ✅ Soft Close piston secured from unnecessary movements to avoid leaks ✅ 6-way/3D easily adjustable with CAM screws ✅ Ideal to replace hinges for cabinets like Lazy Susan corner, Roll Out drawers, Pantries, Closets and Garage ✅ Zero Protrusion at 90 degrees open. and beyond to allow pull-out drawers ✅ Hinge clips onto the plate (not slide-on) for more secure connection ✅ Full Overlay (3/4” – 19mm) ✅ All Steel Construction – 2 hinges/2 face frame mounting plates/8 woodscrews
